works.description: Complete article scraped from my client's site, includes name of my client's site: "How to Clean Blurry Windshields, Glass, and Headlights – Diablo Dents, Paintless Dent Removal and Repair Pleasanton » Diablo Dents, Paintless Dent Removal and Repair Pleasanton"  The entire article, which I personally wrote, and which my client owns with all rights reserved, was stolen by the scraper site. Found on a Google search result for "Did you know that you can actually get a ticket if you’re in an accident and your windshield is too dirty to see through adequately?"
